name: UI Bakery
description: UI Bakery is a low-code platform for building customizable internal tools and business apps with drag-and-drop functionality and API integrations.
longDescription: UI Bakery is a low-code development platform designed to streamline the creation of internal tools, dashboards, and customer portals without extensive coding. Founded in 2018 and headquartered in Lakewood, Colorado, it empowers developers and businesses to rapidly build responsive web applications using a visual drag-and-drop interface. By connecting to various data sources and third-party APIs, UI Bakery enables users to integrate business logic and deploy secure applications efficiently. Its mission is to save development time and simplify complex workflows, making it ideal for businesses seeking to optimize internal processes. The platform supports both cloud and on-premises deployment, catering to diverse organizational needs. Additionally, UI Bakery offers a managed Postgres database, enhancing its capability to build end-to-end applications without external services.
features: Drag-and-drop interface allows users to design responsive web applications quickly without coding expertise.
API integration enables seamless connection with third-party services to enhance app functionality.
Managed Postgres database supports creating, modifying, and managing tables directly within the platform.
AI data source simplifies interaction with APIs like OpenAI, offering predefined actions for tailored prompts.
Multi-page app support allows the creation of complex applications with multiple interconnected pages.
Custom JavaScript code integration enables advanced data processing and business logic customization.
Secure app sharing ensures that internal tools and apps are safely distributed to authorized users.
Pre-built templates provide quick-start options for dashboards, CRMs, and e-commerce applications.
Component customization offers extensive control over the appearance and behavior of UI elements.
On-premises deployment supports self-hosted installations for enhanced data control and compliance.
Real-time data management allows users to view, edit, or delete table data on the fly.
Export to CSV functionality enables users to extract table data for use in other tools.

faqs.question: What is UI Bakery used for?
faqs.answer: UI Bakery is a low-code platform for building internal tools, dashboards, and customer portals using a drag-and-drop interface and API integrations.

faqs.question: Does UI Bakery offer a free plan?
faqs.answer: Yes, UI Bakery provides a free plan with limited usage quotas, allowing users to explore its core features before upgrading.

faqs.question: Can I deploy UI Bakery on-premises?
faqs.answer: Yes, UI Bakery supports on-premises deployment, requiring Docker and Docker Compose for self-hosted setups.

faqs.question: What kind of applications can I build with UI Bakery?
faqs.answer: You can build internal tools, CRMs, admin panels, dashboards, and e-commerce apps with customizable UI and data integrations.

faqs.question: Does UI Bakery support AI integrations?
faqs.answer: Yes, UI Bakery includes an AI data source feature that simplifies interaction with APIs like OpenAI for tailored prompts.

faqs.question: Is coding knowledge required to use UI Bakery?
faqs.answer: No coding is required for basic app creation, but users can add custom JavaScript for advanced functionality.

faqs.question: How does UI Bakery handle data management?
faqs.answer: UI Bakery offers a managed Postgres database for creating and managing tables, with options to edit data and export to CSV.

faqs.question: Can I integrate UI Bakery with third-party APIs?
faqs.answer: Yes, UI Bakery supports integration with various third-party APIs to enhance app functionality and data connectivity.

faqs.question: What support does UI Bakery offer for new users?
faqs.answer: UI Bakery provides onboarding sessions, interactive tutorials, and customer support to help users build their first app.
